document.full_text: on monday, the lede continues to supplement reporting from our colleagues in japan on the aftermath of the devastating earthquake that struck the country on friday, including the ongoing crisis at damaged nuclear power plants.
document.title: the lede: march 14 updates on japan's nuclear crisis and earthquake aftermath
lines_and_colors: on monday, the lede continues to supplement reporting from our colleagues in japan on the aftermath of the devastating earthquake that struck the country on friday, including the ongoing crisis at damaged nuclear power plants.
